title: Material-electrolyte interfacial interaction enabling the formation of inorganic-rich solid electrolyte interphase for fast-charging Si-based lithium-ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00407H, Paper
Kai Cheng, Shuibin Tu, Bao Zhang, Wenyu Wang, Xiaohong Wang, Yuchen Tan, Xiaoxue Chen, Chunhao Li, Chenhui Li, Li Wang, Yongming Sun
Solid-electrolyte interphase (SEI) with high stability and high Li+ conductivity is highly desirable for Si-based lithium-ion batteries with high energy density and superior fast charging capability. Here, we proposed constructing...
